title: Learning Design Practical Skills Enhancement: Motivation Design Strategy Application for Mobile Inquiry-Based English Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can complete real-life problem-solving English projects at an 80% or higher success rate using mobile devices
Achieve a score of 4.0 or higher (on a 5-point scale) in learning immersion surveys through motivation activities based on the ARCS (Attention, Relevance, Confidence, Satisfaction) model
Measure a 15% improvement in learning achievement through peer feedback and reflective journals
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
